english.segment1: King of all the universe. We love You and we come to You know. Asking for Your healing touch. We need You this very hour
english.segment2: Would you help us comprehend what it means to worship You. Â‘cause we're blinded by our circumstance. Heal our eyes today
english.segment3: May we know Your love; feel it course through our veins. Encircling our hearts and embracing our souls. We need Your love and grace to remain, to rearrange our hearts. And change the way we praise
english.segment4: Son of God who took my place. We thank You and may we realize. You've made us righteous in His sight. You took our wrongs and made them right. We owe You all of our lives
english.segment5: Love me, Father, for I am Your son. (and I am Your daughter).
